text: Paris pour un beefsteak is a song written during and about the siege of Paris (1870–71), on 15 October 1870, by Émile Deureux, in Blanqui's journal La Patrie en dangerJenny Raflik, Contemporary history - La France au XIXe siècle, histoire politique Text collection - UFR Letters and Humanities - Department of Geography and of History -Bât. Chênes 2 33, boulevard du Port - F-95011 Cergy-Pontoise cedex - 2007-2008 using the music of Te souviens-tu ? (fr). == References == Category:1870 songs
title: Paris pour un beefsteak
